skins.shipDescription: Gridley-class destroyer, Maury, Hull Number DD-401 Unlock build after receiving
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Maury, the fourth ship of the Gridley-class destroyer squadron. Although I'm the youngest of my class, I'm also the fastest short-distance Union ship! I'm prone to getting hungry a lot? Well, they say that light meals make you live longer, don't they?
skins.acquisition: You can just call me Maury. As a track athlete, I hold the Union's speed record, reaching a maximum speed of 42.8 knots. Just don't make me run a marathon...
skins.login: Commander, want to do some warm-ups with me?
skins.details: Umm... Why are you always watching me do my warm-ups? Do you like watching me sweat?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, want to work out a bit? Sitting for so long is terrible for your body!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I thought we were going for some long distance trip at Wake Island again.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I swear it wasn't my tummy making that noise!
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you helping me recover? ... Thank you...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...!! Hey! There's a line you shouldn't cross when giving massages.
